THE FAKE NOSTALGIA seeks to explore and somewhat archive beautiful web design pieces found within earlier internet culture. Has web design lost it's soul? We haven't decided yet, but we're leaning towards the answer 'Yes'. For this very reason we want to look back and see where current web design came from. Let's blow some dust off the faded screens and get inspired.

Project is only possible because of Internet Archive. Support them in any way you can. They are working on some awesome shit.
